name: Ship Shaper
description:
Build and customize your own jet, then fly it through the city in this 3D shoot'em up!

Created for the PIGSquad Character Creator jam.

Credits
Code & Design: Merlin Benneth
Composer: Levi Ellis
Character Art: YesTea
Writing: Will Lewis

I was fresh out of ideas for interesting Character Creator games that I could make, until I realized that ship builders are basically character creators with parts.  The jam's creative theme was "Unintended Consequences", which made me think of games like Starlink: The Battle for Atlas where if you add a ton of wings and things to your ship you'll end up with a real clunker, so I decided to make something like that.  As an added bonus, this gave me the opportunity to finally learn how to make games in 3D in Game Maker Studio 2 (if you're wondering how that went--No comment).

Controls

  • Mouse to interact with ship builder
    • Select buttons using left click
    • Left click to place parts
    • Right click to remove parts
  • Arrow keys to move ship
  • Spacebar to fire
  • R to abort current flight
  • Esc to quit
  • (Debug) Ctrl to damage self

Some known issues are listed below.  Feel free to let me know of any more!

  • Parts can be removed from any position, regardless of legality.
  • Hitboxes are smaller than expected
